name: The Hexagonal Nightmare (Version 1)
description:
Move the white ball with your finger or the mouse left click to escape the hexagons.

If the white ball is located on the bottom side, click on the bottom right side to make the ball turn counter clock wise.

If the white ball is located on the bottom side, click on the bottom left side to make the ball turn clock wise.

If the white ball is located on the top side, click on the top right side to make the ball turn clock wise.

If the white ball is located on the top side, click on the top left side to make the ball turn counter clock wise.

If the white ball is located on top or the bottom side, click in the middle to stop the ball.

May the you be with force!

The life is not hexagonal for sure!

:-)
